ComicInfo.Summary:
When their investigation into the role of one of Ravnica's biggest Guilds in the assassination attempts on their lives lead Planeswalkers Kaya, Ral, and Vraska deep into the Undercity, they will need to succeed in the impossible - uncover the location of Duskmantle, the Dimir guildhall, and survive to tell the tale!
Meanwhile, the assassin is amassing guild members to betray their own Guilds, even as their true motivations remain a mystery...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Matteo Scalera (a) & Moreno DiNisio (c) | 1 | B | Hidden Planeswalker Variant Cover (Virgin) | Jakub Rebelka | 2 | C | Hidden Planeswalker Variant Cover (Virgin) | Qistina Khalidah | 3 | D | Hidden Planeswalker Variant Cover (Virgin) | Ariela Kristantina | 4 | E | Blank Sketch Variant Cover (Blue) | None | 5 | F | 1:10 Character Design Variant Cover | Ig Guara (a) & Tamra Bonvillain (c) | 6 | G | 1:25 Variant Cover | Derrick Chew | 7 | H | 1:50 Variant Cover (Virgin) | Derrick Chew | 8 | I | 1:100 Variant Cover (Virgin) | Mike Del Mundo | 9 | J | Unlockable Variant Cover (Black & White) | Matteo Scalera | 10 |
